title: Close Encounters S02E10-E12 new 400p rips mp4 (no glitches)
description:
Close Encounters S02E10-E12 new 400p rips mp4 (Las 720p used - glitch free)


thanks to mr bigfoot (LAS) I got some new 720p sources to redo that messed up

3 episodes I did last night well 4am in morning.. and didnt notice until I fully watched


heres higher 400p versions and down from 200mb to 135mb sizes

looks pretty good to me



enjoy and help seed if grabbing these.. can stop seeding the messed up ones now LOL

cheers


UPDATE! since I randomly checked and didnt watch normally theres appears to be a very slight audio out of sync issue by a whole 200ms

very slight you dont notice unless looking at the lips (not having much luck with these episodes am I LOL)

can fix in VLC. bring up track sync and tap it to -200ms

you can fix yourself the files quickly/ able to shift the sound a little in avidemux load it from file pulldown and leave both on COPY and select container MP4.
tick audio shift (left side) -200ms might do it then file pull down and say save
back to file different name will take a whole 10 seconds to fix the file. <a href="
http://sourceforge.net/projects/avidemux/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://sourceforge.net/projects/avidemux/</a>
